name: Super Despair Runner
description:
*WARNING: This game may not be suitable for all audiences*

*WARNING: This game may potentially trigger seizures for people with photosensitive epilepsy. Player/Viewer discretion is advised.*

Get your heart back from the pits of despair!
Click on the red box to move yourself forward. Its your last chance.

Do not fret! I believe in you!  ;D
